content: In 1951, at the Palace of Soviet Pioneers, British International Master Robert Wade played a simultaneous game with 30 local children up to 14 years old. After seven hours of play, MI Wade managed to make 10 draws, having lost the other 20 matches.
translations: ita:Nel 1951, al Palazzo dei pionieri sovietici, il maestro internazionale britannico Robert Wade ha giocato una partita sim
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
